channel.title: I have ram issues
channel.description: Hi, I have ram issues: I have allocated 11G of ram to my whonix workstation, but it use only 1 giga. My host OS is windows and when I chack the task manager, it is writed that the whonix workstation use 11 giga of ram, but when I do the free --giga command in the workstation, it always use only one giga (10 giga are free). So my workstation freeze when I just open tor or open a new tab and sometimes it completly freeze. Best regards ElCoquilletos

item.title: I have ram issues
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Just confusion about how to interpret the output of these tools?
That is most likely like that for any Debian or even any Linux (inside VirtualBox)?

Whonix – 26 Jan 22

Information Booster might be Available!

Utilizing other resources to help solve questions/issues unspecific to Whonix ™.

Try a non-Kicksecure VM

(Whonix is based on Kicksecure.)

Please confirm this is or is not an issue outside of Whonix / Kicksecure.

Read full topic

item.title: I have ram issues
item.dc:creator: ElCoquilletos
item.description:
EDIT: After 10 minutes, it shows only 1,4 gigas of RAM used by the workstation in the task manager of my host OS.
Then I have launch tor and it have definitively freeze.

Read full topic

item.title: I have ram issues
item.dc:creator: ElCoquilletos
item.description:
Hi,
I have ram issues: I have allocated 11G of ram to my whonix workstation, but it use only 1 giga.
My host OS is windows and when I chack the task manager, it is writed that the whonix workstation use 11 giga of ram, but when I do the free --giga command in the workstation, it always use only one giga (10 giga are free).
So my workstation freeze when I just open tor or open a new tab and sometimes it completly freeze.
Best regards
ElCoquilletos

Read full topic
